name: ANTIMATTER (Kuhakuh, El Mapache, LilianCLV, Wiloux, Amir1632)
name_original: ANTIMATTER (Kuhakuh, El Mapache, LilianCLV, Wiloux, Amir1632)
description:
What if a black hole became sentient ? And then took a liking to eating everything in its path !?  And what if it was not the only one ?

End. This. Universe.

Embody a black hole and grow bigger by eating space itself. Avoid directly touching astral objects bigger than yourself and everything will be just fine. 

EAT EVERYTHING.

Credits

Benjamin Chariou -> Game Programmer
